caption.p: ( a) Optical image of the Au electrode after a Ca plating process. ( b) Energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy (EDS) profile within the yellow square. ( c) Scanning electron microscopy (SEM) image of Ca deposits on the Au electrode after Ca plating in a Au | CMC/DME/THF | Ca cell, and EDS maps of Ca, Au, O, and B.
